Europe - REMOTE - Apply at http://nlcollect-bv.workable.com/jobs/7652

ClubCollect has created a service for sports clubs and other organizations to make invoicing of club members a breeze. Invoicing, reminding, online payments: everything is processed via ClubCollect.

We're a small team (just 20 people including 7 programmers), we love remote working but we also like to get together for beers and a great dinner.

ClubCollect is built in Elixir (+ Phoenix) and Ruby (+ Ruby on Rails).

We value simplicity, creative solutions, and the ability to get things done.

You will have the opportunity to contribute to all areas of our code base.

Requirements:

* Experience with Elixir or Erlang

* Several years experience with a modern web framework such as Rails or Django

@recruiters: please don't contact us, we're not interested.
